name: Leaper (yanniboi)
description:
GDKO Leaper Clone This is a prototype for the Game Dev Knock Out competition. Not a full game.  For more information: https://itch.io/jam/gdko-round-5

Lore

  • You are a frog ninja
  • The world is out to destroy you
  • If you can get to the top, you will succeed
  • Makes sense to me....

Gameplay

  • WASD or Controller to move
  • Space or A/X to jump
  • Some other speedy tricks are undocumented (you'll find them... 😉️)
  • If you die you restart the current level
  • If you die too often the game restarts and you lose your progress
Devlogs

Coming soon...
